name: Phrasis.Studio

screenshots.caption: The main window using the german translation

short_description:
The program aims to offer a possibility to create and test regular expressions at once. Also there will be an function to import data to test the regular expressions very easily.

The name of the program is not final - its only an construct with the latin translation for a phrase.
summary: A program environment to create and test regular expressions.
